title: Which Japanese manga horror artists are similar to Junji Ito’s style? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only thing I saw that was at least remotely similar to Junji Ito’s works is… Wakusei Closet by Tsubana.  It gets creepy and gives vibes similar to hellstar remina.  There’s also Yajin by Okabe Uru.   Well, MAAAYBE Homunculus, but it was jsut odd and not creepy/scary. So it is one hell of a stretch. Some books try to get to the creepiness level of best Ito’s stories, but they usually fail. So, aside Wakusei Closet it is hard to recommend anything similar. ITO is quite unique.
